name: Twisted Reality
description:
Twisted Reality is a game about a man that lost his family in an accident and mixed his feelings with reality. You will explore his dreams and will have to get back. 

The game was made in 60 Hours for Games Factory Jam 5

Controls : 

W A S D : Move Arround

SHIFT : Sprint

E : Toggle / Pick Up

The team : 

Rokas Zilinskas (Rokunas) : 3D Modelling / Level Design

Arnas Sungaila (Bioman) : Programming

David Karuza (Karu) : 3D Modelling / Level Design

Oliver Van Velzen (Ovv) : Programming
